recommendations.solution: Add canonical URLs to all pages to prevent duplicate content issues
recommendations.action: Ensure all page components include canonical metadata

recommendations.solution: Submit updated sitemap to Google Search Console
recommendations.action: Go to Google Search Console > Sitemaps > Add new sitemap URL

recommendations.solution: Optimize images and reduce JavaScript bundle size
recommendations.action: Use Next.js Image component and enable compression
